There's a discussion of sharing GPU memory in #2210 (comment) and it seems hard.

For sharing main memory, possibly related issue to get rid of copy here . I suspect that Allocator interface would need to be modified to allow keeping pointers to memory that it doesn't own

body:
There's a discussion of sharing GPU memory in https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/2210#event-706768999 and it seems hard. 

For sharing main memory, possibly related issue to get rid of copy [here](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/distributed_runtime/tensor_coding.cc#L199) . I suspect that Allocator interface would need to be modified to allow keeping pointers to memory that it doesn't own
